https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qBtH6s9HeHd3vb9OJJ7pHTaEZMI.jpg A self explanatory film made up of seven short scenes. Playing with scale and bringing objects to life, the film creates a subverted world where the mundane becomes absurd. Bad Things That Could Happen
